metadata.Title: CVE-2023-26607 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: In the Linux kernel 6.0.8, there is an out-of-bounds read in ntfs_attr_findin fs/ntfs/attrib.c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
